name: 10inch Under Cabinet Lights, Motion Sensor Light Indoor, Wireless Closet Lights, 1800mAh Rechargeable Battery, Magnetic, 5 Levels Dimmable, Under Counter Lights for Kitchen, Bathroom (2 Pack)
short_description: Motion-Activated Under Cabinet Lights: Enjoy effortless lighting with our upgraded under cabinet lights. In motion sensor mode, the lights automatically turn on when motion is detected within a 120° range and 10 feet in dark or low-light environments. After 20 seconds of no movement, they turn off automatically. Say goodbye to fumbling for switches in the dark—let the motion sensor lights respond to your needs without any effort.

Upgraded Premium LEDs: With 26 high-efficiency LEDs—each as bright as 3–4 standard LEDs. This under cabinet light delivers up to 100 lumens of 6500K daylight-white, even illumination. It effortlessly brightens dark corners and also works great for reading, camping, or as a flashlight.

Dimmable Closet Lights: Featuring 5 adjustable brightness settings (20%–100%), or a long press activates stepless dimming, meets different lighting needs. You can easily tailor this LED cabinet light to your needs, whether you need task lighting for cooking or a motion sensor night light that offers a soft glow without disturbing others.

Powered 1800mAh Battery: Our rechargeable cabinet light lasts 7-31 days in Auto Mode, depending on usage. In high-traffic areas like the kitchen, the battery drains faster, but in areas like closets or cabinet spaces that only light up when the door is opened, the battery life can last twice as long. At full brightness, it lasts 9 hours in Always-On Mode, and with just a 3-hour charge, it’s good to go. Don’t worry about wiring, available outlets or battery replacement like other styles.

Tool-free, Punch-free, Easy installation: Our motion sensor lights with the built-in magnet, simply attach the light to any metal surface like your kitchen cabinet, fridge, or shelving unit. For non-metal surfaces, use the included sticky iron plates to mount it on closets, pantries, or hallways. No drilling, no fuss—just quick, reliable lighting wherever you need it.

name: Rechargeable Battery Operated Lights 3-5 Months Endurance Motion Sensor Light Outdoor High Brightness, USB Charging Flood Light for Garage Entryways Yard Indoor Black 2Pack (Small Size)
short_description: 【Long-Lasting Performance, No More Frequent Charging】 With a built-in high-efficiency battery, this battery-operated light offers long-lasting performance, saving you the hassle of constant recharging. Under normal usage of 10 activations per day, it lasts for 3-5 months(Depends on the lighting mode), even in the winter without sunshine. After motion is detected, the light stays on for 20 seconds and automatically shuts off, providing energy-saving benefits while delivering reliable illumination

【Small body, High brightness– Dual Brightness Modes】 As the brightest battery-operated light in its class, this motion sensor flood light offers 1500 lumens of soft, ambient light, creating a cozy atmosphere. For stronger illumination, the 3000 lumens high brightness mode ensures optimal lighting for your garden, front door, or garage. Whether used indoors or outdoors, it meets all your lighting needs, offering the perfect balance of brightness for any space

【USB Charging, Always Ready to Shine】 Say goodbye to the limitations of solar-powered lights and tangled extension cords. With a USB-C charging port, you can easily recharge your motion sensor light anytime, anywhere—whether at home, using a power bank, or in your car. This indoor and outdoor motion sensor light is designed to work year-round, providing consistent lighting, regardless of the season

【Waterproof Design, Built to Last】 This motion sensor flood light features a high-quality waterproof design, ensuring it can withstand rain, snow, or extreme weather conditions. Whether it’s heavy rain or chilly winter nights, this light will continue to perform reliably, providing consistent illumination. Its robust construction makes it the ideal choice for any outdoor lighting application, ensuring lasting quality and dependable performance in all environments

【Versatile Lighting for Indoor and Outdoor Use】 This security light is ideal for patios, entryways, and garages. Equipped with a motion sensor, it automatically lights up upon detection, offering both safety and convenience. It covers up to 30 square meters with a 120° motion detection range and a 180° illumination angle. Dual light heads can rotate horizontally by 100° and vertically by 135°, ensuring flexible and precise lighting for any area

【Tips】Turn on the light in a dark environment for it to function normally. The light features a light-sensing mode—if it detects ambient light, it will not turn on. Switching between 2 modes: Press the switch once: The light flashes briefly. If motion is detected when activating, the sensor automatically triggers and enters working mode.If no motion is detected: It will stay on for 20 seconds in Mode 1 (low brightness) before normal sensing activates.Press the switch a second time: The light flashes twice, entering Mode 2 (high brightness).
